text: hi I'm Joseph Poirier I'm the vice
president of engineering with bizarre
voice I would say overall the
foundational problem that we see in
terms of Trends is the growth in data
volume for example uh for many years in
certain areas of our business data has
doubled or tripled year over year which
means over the course of a few years you
might be dealing with 10 times as much
data that you had only a few years ago
infrastructure and systems and processes
that you have to deal with that data
today may not work
in the future with 10 times or 20 times
or 100 times more more data I would say
overall our foundational
issues with data volume and dealing with
massive amounts of data
forces us to solve those problems
holistically at an infrastructure level
so that we can then build Innovation on
top of that reliable data over time AWS
helped bizarre voice in a whole variety
of ways we use practically every single
service that's available on the Amazon
web services platform overall AWS has
been a fantastic partner for bizarre
voice over the years
